title: [Atoll, Inner Edge]
description: Ivory and obsidian stones alternate along a path leading up to a yellow barrier.  The air surrounding the barrier ripples and wavers, distorting the ruins just visible on the other side.  Hollowed out stones stained crimson line the barrier, each holding a humanoid skull as a warning to those who enter.

Ivory and obsidian stones alternate along a path leading up to a yellow barrier.  The air surrounding the barrier ripples and wavers, some type of ruins visible on the other side.  A line of humanoid skulls is nailed into the stones beneath them, a warning to those who enter.
